column1: #Text=Korra says : " This is a wonderful feast in your honor , Uncle . "
#Text=" Unalaq says : " And that is a shame , since the Avatar is the bridge between the material world and the spirits .
#Text=That is why I want so badly to teach you .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " I thought I had made it clear that Tenzin is teaching her .
#Text=" Unalaq says : " Every Avatar before you traveled the world to learn .
#Text=It was Tenzin and your father who kept you secluded at the South Pole .
#Text=" Korra says : " I thought Aang ordered the White Lotus to keep me down here ?
#Text=" Tonraq says : " We all did what we thought was best for you .
#Text=" Korra says : " Who I train with should be my decision , Dad , not yours or Tenzin 's .
